features: ADORABLE DOLL FOR BIG ADVENTURES - Dressed in a colorful outfit with an adorable headband and seated in a metal umbrella baby toy stroller, this realistic-looking baby doll is perfect for creating special memories. Includes bottle, rattle, bib, an extra outfit, and small accessory bag

FUN CREATIVE PLAY - Let their little minds explore as they dress up, feed and cuddle them. Take the baby doll and stroller set along on all their adventures - strap their baby doll in, and they are sure to have a blast together!

FIRST LOVE - Comes in an attractive gift box, making it the perfect present for birthdays and Christmas. Let your little one be the proud parent of their very own baby doll stroller set and watch them create special memories that will last a lifetime

IGNITE THEIR IMAGINATION - A 12’’ doll with stroller that encourages creative gameplay and emotional development through storytelling and pretend play. Perfect for learning to nurture and love with their first friend

SOFT AND POSABLE - Made from high-quality eco-friendly material, this doll has a soft, snuggly feel, is resistant to moisture, is strong, and durable. A collection focused on safety, fun, education, and enriching the lives of kids ages 2+ years
body.description: This beautiful baby doll from the Dream Collection will ignite your little one's imagination and bring endless hours of creative pretend play. Dressed in a colorful outfit with an adorable headband and seated in a metal umbrella stroller. Made from high-quality eco-friendly materials that are resistant to moisture, strong and durable, this 12’’ doll has a soft, snuggly feel and comes in an attractive gift box, making it the ideal present for birthdays or Christmas. Perfect for learning to nurture and love with their first friend – your little one will adore dressing her up, feeding her, and rocking her to sleep! Suitable for kids aged 2 years and older, it's sure to create special memories that will last a lifetime.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Extra outfit, bib, bag, bottle and tether ring. 7 piece set. 12" Baby Doll Care Gift set with Stroller 12" Soft body baby doll. Stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this was a present to my granddaughter, it is her favorite doll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler was in love at first sight with this doll on a stroller!
reviews.reviewText: I got this doll+stroller combo for my 21 month old daughter and it was an instant hit! After reading the bad reviews here, I was a bit skeptical but took a chance. The doll came tightly packed in a narrow tall box but instead of pulling the doll's head out, I used gravity to let the stroller and the doll slide out with little help. The doll is very cute (see close up picture), especially the eyes which look so real and the lips that have a slight shimmer on it. My daughter played with her all day, pushing the cute little stroller all around the house and even took her to bed. It has a perfectly soft body for toddlers transitioning from soft toys/dolls to firmer/harder material dolls. The accessories are good quality (bib, dress and bottle) which my daughter enjoys. The only issues I would say is that the stroller is very smooth and rolls quickly before my daughter has finished securing the doll in the stroller seat so it gets a bit challenging for her and the stroller cloth seat comes off from the frame at the corners quite a few times. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase and highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: my daughter is obsessed with this stroller, she takes it outside, on the grass and it works perfect. it fits her size and she loves the baby is comes with it- it comes with a change of clothing, a bottle and a baby toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but small
reviews.reviewText: This is really cute, but quite small. Will be for our two-year-old, but will be too short for her to push by the time she's three. Sturdy enough for it's size, but not very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described and easy to use. Nice assortment.
reviews.reviewText: The one complaint in the reviews was that fabric seat came off too easily. I just sewed it tight. But a pice of velcro would work too. No problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical of buying this because ppl had negative reviews on the quality. It def isn’t worth the money but my daughter loves serving the baby milk lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddlers.
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is grear for toddlers. My 2 year old loves it. The baby that comes with it is cute, and comes with an extra clothing set and a couple of other accessories. The three stars are for the actual seat of the stroller, it does come off all the time. When the stroller is assembled, the fabric of the seat just goes over the metal frame. Well, every time the baby is taken off the seat the seat comes off the frame. It sounds like it's not a big deal,but a toddler would put and take out that baby multiple time in a matter of minutes and every time somebody (me in this case) needs to fix the seat. After the 2-3 times of doing that, my toddler just takes the baby and puts it in an older stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby doll & accessories
reviews.reviewText: Our granddaughter was getting a new sister. She loves her own baby doll

reviews.reviewTitle: 1 1/2 year granddaughter never stopped playing with it! Absolutely loved it!

reviews.reviewText: Bought for my niece’s daughter. She absolutely loves it. Good quality product.
